description:
EVERMORE - TRUTH OF THE WORLD: WELCOME TO THE SHOW, album released
20th March 2009. Encoded 320kbps [Lame] mp3. Front cover only included.


Evermore are an alternative rock band originally from Feilding, New Zealand,
now based in Melbourne, Australia. Evermore have sold in excess of 250,000
albums, have been nominated for 6 ARIA Awards, have had a #1 single with 'Light
Surrounding You' which was the third most played Australian song in 2007, and
are undeniably one of Australia's biggest rock bands.


'Truth Of The World: Welcome To The Show' is Evermore's third studio album.
Evermore's singer and guitarist Jon Hume said about the album "I heard someone
say that albums were dead and everyone just wants three minute songs these
days. That's exactly what we are trying to fight with this record. We hit reset
on what this band was about, threw everything out and just imagined the record
we would want to hear someone else make. Something you could put on and not
ever want to hit skip, one piece of music that ebbs and flows but never stops.
It's a concept album that takes inspiration from trash entertainment, news
headlines and political propaganda, and turns it into an over the top, fun,
rock'n'roll show."
